channel.title: [525] Client Connection?
channel.description:
It will not let me connect o local host...nothing. I've tried a lot... with 127.0.0.1 it gives me the error thing that's supposed to pop up when there's no server open... Please help! i have my cache525 in my C:\..... So, what's wrong?
EDIT: Got it to 98%... It goes to update server 98%... Where do i get the other 2% from?
